message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early!
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the inflation we have to account for.  Let's get this done!
Not quite fair, Bob. I think you're getting a better deal than me, considering the inflation. I'll pass on this offer.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise. This split should be more reasonable.
